text: Ronald Paris (12 August 1933 – 17 September 2021) was a German painter and graphic artist. Between 1993 and 1999, Paris was a professor at the Burg Giebichenstein Arts Academy in Halle. Paris died on 17 September 2021 at the age of 88.Brandenburger Maler Ronald Paris gestorben , rbb24.de, veröffentlicht und abgerufen am 18. September 2021 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German painters
title: Ronald Paris
